<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Point-Blank Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=358) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 144 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You are wielding a ranged weapon.

</column>

---

You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly. When using a ranged volley weapon while you are in this stance, you don't take the penalty to your attack rolls from the [volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=201) trait. When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.
